about_the_game:
Thanks for the overtime

"After Tasks” is a horror game in which you experience a special kind of work done at school.

The work is simple. All you have to do is to play the video and wait until it finishes.

Play the video, solve the phenomenon, find the best solution according to the situation, and complete the job.

Don't worry, we have a manual

Our work is very varied. But don't worry, we have prepared a manual for this purpose.

Most of the information is in the manual. Please do not miss any information.

Please be careful not to be confused by the large amount of information in the manual.

Please don't do that. It's obstruction of business

Various phenomena that occur within the school can affect video playback.

When dealing with them, please implement the appropriate solution for each phenomenon.

Also, watch out for the invisible “them”. They will target you relentlessly.

Strange things for strange things

Sometimes a Amulet is needed to deal with paranormal phenomena.

The Amulet should be written on the spot, attached to the object, and taken to the TV after it is resolved.

I hear these things are good these days

Some of the phenomena that occur in late night school can make business operations more meaningful.

If completed as additional work, they may help with overtime for the day.

Estimated playing time : 3 ~ 4 hours
